title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 27 - Higher Education Opportunity Programs
content:

State Regulations

Subpart 27-1 - Nonpublic Institutions (§ 27-1.1)

Subpart 27-2 - Public Institutions (§ 27-2.1 to 27-2.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 27

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 6451, 6452

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
